definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: thrust, crowd, oppress (NH id., Ar. dah.aqa drive away, remove, Aram. [[דְּחַק]], dh.aq)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִדְחָêקוּן]] thrust, crowd, of locusts in swarm Joe 2:8; Pt. act. pl. sf. [[לֽחֲחֵיהֶם וְדׂחֲקֵיהֶם]] Ju Jdg 2:18 (because of) them that maltreated and oppressed them.
